name: Merry_Madness
description:
This is a project for the Post Jam Productions' Holiday Jam 2022!

We had 1 month to create a game and our idea was to make a arcade type game where 1 player will play as a little elf trying to collect presents whilst a big robot Santa (the other player) will try to stop them.

Sounds silly right? That's because it is and we love it because of that haha

How to play:

The elf uses WASD or the Arrow keys to move, collect presents by moving ACROSS one side of the screen to the other as you must deposit them back where the glowly stuff is to earn points.

S.A.N.T.A uses the MOUSE either using left or right click to try and turn the elf into a present.

Enjoy our little goofy game!

BSS for the Santa model

Jason for the background concepts
